name: HyperBowl Rome
description:
Bowl ancient Rome, in the second original HyperBowl lane! Feel free to knock over vases and push blocks off the wall, but watch out for the power flowers - they'll give you a boost whether you want it or not!

Swipe up along the screen to push the bowling ball forward, left and right to roll horizontally, down to push the ball back. Tip: longer swipes provide more power. Pinch to pause.

Visit our Facebook page http://hyperbowl.rocks/ for the latest news.

If you enjoy this lane, check out the full HyperBowl app for all of the original and new lanes.

Built with the original HyperBowl art and sound assets licensed from Absolute Certainty Inc., the Unity game engine from Unity Technologies, MacXWare Font Library, Lean Localization from Carlos Wilkes, Universal Accessibility Plugin from MetalPop Games, iTween from pixelplacement, and Real Flames from BlackfireFX.

HyperBowl is a registered trademark of Absolute Certainty Inc.
